page.title: 10The Future of Maiden Castle
page.content: Owned by the Duchy of Cornwall, Maiden Castle has recently been placed under the protection of English Heritage, whose job it is to preserve, manage and promote public interest in, Englands historic buildings and monuments. English Heritage wish to bring Maiden Castle before a wider audience as well as protecting it from further erosion.At present,in co- operation with the Prince of Wales Trust, there is a scheme for further excavation and for repair to damaged ramparts. The repair work is to be done by deprived young people, paid for by the Prince's Trust and the excavation will interest the International Conference of Archaeology at Southampton in 1986. English Heritage wish to develop land aroud the monument for an Interpretation Centre.
